EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-04-28-Memphis BBQ Raffle Send 2.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: We Want to Send you to the 2017 World BBQ Championship! |Spend 30 Minutes with a Turbonomic Engineer for a Chance to Win
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/YQMY9QG?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_6ailg567og=[marketo_6ailg567og_value]&marketo_27kfq4j6cg=[marketo_27kfq4j6cg_value]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, At Turbonomic we understand that vendor meetings can sometimes take away from time that could be spent with friends and family. Our mission is to give that time back to you, before you even consider becoming a Turbonomic customer. This is why we want to take a step back, let you know that we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer that will give you time back for any time spent with us. We are offering the chance to win one of 2 VIP Experience Tickets with parking for the 2017 World Championship BBQ Cooking Contest in Memphis from Wednesday May 12th to Saturday, May 20th. Simply take a few minutes to fill out our 2017 World Championship Barbecue Cooking Contest VIP Experience Turbonomic Giveaway <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/YQMY9QG?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_6ailg567og=[marketo_6ailg567og_value]&marketo_27kfq4j6cg=[marketo_27kfq4j6cg_value]]]> and meet with one of our Turbonomic Engineers to be entered to win. The Giveaway will end on Friday, May 5th, 2017 so make sure to fill out your submission today for a chance to win! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/YQMY9QG?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_6ailg567og=[marketo_6ailg567og_value]&marketo_27kfq4j6cg=[marketo_27kfq4j6cg_value]]]> -The Turbonomic Team
